description: This trap is sent each time a voltage channel
reading comes back in normal range.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD VM-MIB::trapVoltageGood VM-MIB::voltTrapSystem s EXAMPLE VM-MIB::voltTrapGroup s EXAMPLE VM-MIB::voltTrapMessage s EXAMPLE VM-MIB::voltItemStatus i 0 VM-MIB::voltReading s EXAMPLE

description: Name of the system generating the alert
variables.name: VM-MIB::voltTrapSystem

description: DMI group generating the alert
variables.name: VM-MIB::voltTrapGroup

description: Alert message
variables.name: VM-MIB::voltTrapMessage

description: This is the status of the particular voltage item
variables.name: VM-MIB::voltItemStatus

description: The measured voltage.
variables.name: VM-MIB::voltReading

description: This trap is sent each time a voltage channel
reading goes out of warning range.

description: This trap is sent each time a battery with low
charge is re-charged above the specified low
threshold.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD VM-MIB::trapBatteryGood VM-MIB::batteryTrapSystem s EXAMPLE VM-MIB::batteryTrapGroup s EXAMPLE VM-MIB::batteryTrapMessage s EXAMPLE VM-MIB::batteryStatus i 0 VM-MIB::batteryChargePercent i 0

description: Name of the system generating the alert
variables.name: VM-MIB::batteryTrapSystem

description: DMI group generating the alert
variables.name: VM-MIB::batteryTrapGroup

description: Alert message
variables.name: VM-MIB::batteryTrapMessage

description: The status of the battery.
variables.name: VM-MIB::batteryStatus

description: The percentage of charge remaining in the
battery.
variables.name: VM-MIB::batteryChargePercent

description: This trap is sent each time the battery charge
is under the specified low threshold.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD VM-MIB::trapBatteryLow VM-MIB::batteryTrapSystem s EXAMPLE VM-MIB::batteryTrapGroup s EXAMPLE VM-MIB::batteryTrapMessage s EXAMPLE VM-MIB::batteryStatus i 0 VM-MIB::batteryChargePercent i 0
